Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Disorder by Site/Head and Neck Disorder/Oral Disorder/Oral Cavity Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Oral Cavity Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Dental Disorder/Gigantiform Cementoma
Record.Description: A rare, benign, slow growing, multifocal, and expansile lesion of the jaws. Both familiar and sporadic cases have been reported. It is characterized by a fibroblastic proliferation, cementum, and limited bone formation.
